text: Shamarin () is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. It is located on the Queiq Plain, northeast of Azaz, some north of the city of Aleppo, and less than south of the border with the Turkish province of Kilis. The village administratively belongs to Nahiya Azaz in Azaz District. Nearby localities include Shamarikh to the south and Tulayl ash-Sham to the southwest. In the 2004 census, Shamarin had a population of 506. ==References==
title: Shamarin
